newsitem.title: JAPAN: Minolta, Yamamura to form circuit board venture.
newsitem.headline: Minolta, Yamamura to form circuit board venture.

text.p: Minolta Co Ltd and Yamamura Glass Co Ltd said on Wednesday that they had agreed to set up a joint venture to produce and sell circuit boards used in computer hard disc drives this month.
The two said in a statement that they will set up the new company -- Myg Disc Co Ltd -- on a equal basis, and that it will be capitalised at 450 million yen.
The new company, to be based in Hyogo prefecture, western Japan, will start production this year and reach full production by next April.
The two firms said the reason behind the setting up of the unit is anticipated rapid growth in demand.
A Minolta spokesman told Reuters that initial production was targeted at 100,000 boards a month.
